name: Me and My friend FRED THE AI (game jam)
name_original: Me and My friend FRED THE AI (game jam)
description:
You and your friend Fred (who's vary Dum) must escape

there are lots of stuff like sound effects so sorry about that

Ending 1

At the start of the game just say something Dum or random.

Ending 2

Get to the part where you have to convince him to flick the lever and say something Dum or random.

Ending 3

Get to the part where you have to convince him to flick the lever and say "eat banana".

Ending 4

At the start of the game say no or yes and when you get  to the part where you have to convince him to flick the lever and say plz and when you get to the part where you have to convince him to open the door say because were friends.
